member.name: T:System.Resources.Extensions.PreserializedResourceWriter
member.summary: Provides APIs similar to that can write pre-serialized resource data.

member.param: The output stream.

member.name: M:System.Resources.Extensions.PreserializedResourceWriter.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that writes the resources to the specified file.
member.param: The output file name.

member.name: M:System.Resources.Extensions.PreserializedResourceWriter.AddActivatorResource(System.String,System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a resource of the specified type represented by a value that is passed to the type's constructor when reading the resource.
member.param: The resource name.
The value of the resource in form understood by the type's constructor.
The assembly qualified type name of the resource.
An optional value that indicates whether, after resources have been written, the stream should be closed () or left open (, the default value).
member.exception: The object's type is , but it is unseekable.

member.name: M:System.Resources.Extensions.PreserializedResourceWriter.AddBinaryFormattedResource(System.String,System.Byte[],System.String)
member.summary: Adds a resource of the specified type, represented by a byte array, that will be passed to when reading the resource.
member.param: The resource name.
A byte array containing the value of the resource in form understood by .
The optional assembly qualified type name of the resource. The default value is .

member.name: M:System.Resources.Extensions.PreserializedResourceWriter.AddResource(System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Adds a byte array as a named resource to the list of resources to be written to a file.
member.param: The resource name.
The byte array to add as a resource.

member.param: The resource name.
The stream to add as a resource.
